title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs with cheese and combine with pasta and pancetta. Serve with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste. Grill chicken. Prepare sauce with tomato puree and cream. Combine and serve.
